name: 100 Shapes
description:
Innovation with user-centered design and development.
We have 10+ years experience in digital transformation designing and building bespoke software for the UK's largest brands including BBC and ITV.
Off-the-shelf tools will never do everything you want. We make software from scratch to suit your unique business.
From Health & Safety software to Media Management workflows there's no challenge we can't consider.
Firstly, we discuss what you need: we ask questions, we consult. Next, we plan an approach: we explain and guide. Then we design and build and finally, we host and manage in the cloud. All you need is a problem for us to solve.
